dialog.text: You've been asleep for 2 days now, you'll feel better in a few moments. You're the last waking up!
We don't know much for now, we've all been hit by some kind of lightning explosion. Strangely no one was physically hurt, but strangely I noticed that we have.. Evolved.. a lot since.
Now now, %T, slowly. Allow me help you. You should report to the chief outside when you're ready.
